name: Sneaky Roach - Bug and Insect Smasher
name_original: Sneaky Roach - Bug and Insect Smasher
description:
Sneaky Roach is the new bug smasher hit for 2016!

It mixes classic smash action games with exciting features such as power-ups, collectibles, and achievements.

Highly entertaining for kids, as well as adults. Special virtual bonuses can make the game easier for young players. Defend yourself from this killer bug invasion!

▶ GAME FEATURES

● Several game modes
● Variety of bugs to smash
● Beautifully animated butterflies - don't kill them!
● Global Leaderboards and Achievements
● In-game Statistics
● Power-ups and Gifts
● Great game to pass the time

▶ SUPPORT

● Optimized experience for iPad
● Supports iPhone and iPod

▶ ▶ ▶ Wait no more! Get it now while it's completely FREE !
